info.name: Gaurav Mishra
info.about: I'm a Computer Engineer and passionate Full Stack Developer with a strong foundation in designing, building, and deploying robust web applications. My expertise lies in creating dynamic and user-centric solutions that bridge the gap between functionality and aesthetics. With a comprehensive understanding of both frontend and backend technologies, I specialize in developing seamless digital experiences. Whether it's crafting intuitive user interfaces or implementing efficient server-side logic, I take pride in delivering high-quality results.
info.careerGoals: To pursue a career in software engineering with a focus on innovation and problem-solving.

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science

projects.name: Text to Speech AI Bot
projects.description: A text-to-speech AI bot built using Python and Microsoft Azure Cloud Services for speech recognition, with AI capabilities using Googleâ€™s Gemini AI.

projects.name: AQI Forecasting Using FB Prophet Model
projects.description: Developed a forecasting model for Air Quality Index (AQI) using the FB Prophet model, incorporating seasonality and holidays for improved prediction accuracy. Utilized visualization tools like Matplotlib and Plotly.

projects.name: Movie Recommendation and Sentiment Analysis System
projects.description: Developed a Movie Recommendation System using TF-IDF Vectorization and Cosine Similarity, and integrated a Sentiment Analysis System with Logistic Regression to classify movie reviews.

responsibilities: Organized a math quiz competition to promote problem-solving skills.
